A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was the most Un-Star Wars movie of the series. Been a favorite of mine since I was a little kid\, and Disney has done to Star Wars what I was afraid they’d do to Star Wars. The plot was pretty light and steered the story in a new direction and the franchise is really Star Wars by name only now. I think I’m punching out. Don’t really care what happens in the next movie. Sad!
